package.name: codrha_local_planner
package.description: This package provides an implementation of the Continuous Optimal Decentralized Receding Horizon Approach to local multi-robot navigation on a plane. Given a global plan to follow and a costmap, the local planner produces velocity commands to send to a mobile base. This package supports only robot who's footprint can be represented as a cicrle, and exposes its configuration as ROS parameters that can be set in a launch file. The parameters for this planner are also dynamically reconfigurable. This package's ROS wrapper adheres to the BaseLocalPlanner interface specified in the nav_core package.
